alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 12:20PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Tipton, northwestern Fayette and northeastern Shelby Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1220 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brighton, or 8 miles southwest of Covington, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Covington, Munford, Brighton, Tipton, Atoka, Mason, Gallaway, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Garland, Braden, Egypt, Cotton Lake, Canaan Grove, Redwood, Gift, Gainesville, Tabernacle, Clopton and Idaville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
